Content: Also another annoying bug:  when logging into the wallet and inputting the password (not the pin) I cannot use the Android's normal paste feature, so I have to type in the long, complex password I'd set

Author: ca333#0118
Content:
everyone we released atomicDEX mobile 0.1.8 (beta) - this version brings many improvements and resolves pretty much all of the reported issues. It is already on playstore (Android) and will be available for iOS (testflight) in the coming 24-48h (pending approval). Happy testing!

**changelog:**

```
fixes:
refactor api provider
initialisation
wallet configuration
encryption/decryption
add missing exception handlers

features:
new mm2
new encryption
sync improvement
add additional logs [debug]
enable biometric only protection
add precise error messages
```

Author: benzo365#8202
Content: can we put in a request for smaller bitcoin orders, we're supposed to be testing with small amounts yet cannot sell $10 worth of kmd for BTC.. @ca333

Author: ca333#0118
Content: will check this and revaluate the situation @benzo365 - the main reason for this limit is that with lower amounts the DEX fee could result in a dust-transaction which wouldn't be accepted by (most) network participants. However - we will check this and keep you updated.

Author: benzo365#8202
Content: @ca333 thanks for the consideration

Author: phideas#8309
Content:
Just a simple UX suggestion: Ethereum network is currently clogged due to high activity. Since AtomicDex tx rely on underlying blockchains, it would be cool to inform users in wallet if there is any slow down on supported blockchains. this could prevent potentional failed swaps and also save time and resources to avoid human interaction.
edit: i just waited >5min to confirm a tx on eth with normal tx fee.

Author: vichiet#4058
